detail_desc: Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short, voluminous, double-layered puff sleeves in crinkled organza with concealed elastication at the hems.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 22 pairs of studs and three pairs of hoops.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a fake fly, fake welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Long cardigan in a soft, horizontal knit with long dolman sleeves. Stocking-stitched edge around the opening, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in woven fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Soft jersey vest top in a relaxed fit with a rib trim around the neckline and deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Three rings in recycled silver with decorative gemstones. The rings are in various designs and sizes.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Cycling shorts in stretch fabric with a high, elasticated waist and ribbed section at the sides.
Joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets and a welt back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a flounce over each shoulder and covered elastication at the hems. Gathered seams on the skirt for added width. Unlined.

Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a round neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with frill-trimmed shoulder straps.
Jacket in soft washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, fake flap pockets with a button at the top, and press-studs at the cuffs.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a button-down collar with concealed buttoning, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Knitted top in a relaxed fit with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Mosaic-patterned scarf in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Support panels and gathers for a draped effect at the top, and a seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a yoke at the top, short, embroidered butterfly sleeves, buttons at the back and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Set in soft fabric. Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and braided belt. Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft satin with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and sparkly stone press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a collar and wrapover V-neck. Low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Short-sleeved shirt in a crêpe weave with a resort collar and buttons down the front. The polyester content of the shirt is partly recycled.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in soft cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. One patterned and one in a solid colour.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a tie detail at the top of the front, seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and terry appliqué at one side. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.

Jersey-lined, pull-on trousers in woven fabric made from a cotton blend. Ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly, diagonal front pockets, back pockets and gently tapered legs. Lined in cotton jersey.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a woven broderie anglaise flounce at the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and an appliqué on the front.
Jacket in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a large appliqué on the back. Collar, press-studs down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.

V-neck playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.

Knee-length shirt jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and a metal fastening at the front.

Lace blouse woven in a cotton blend with a round neck, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length sleeves with a flared flounce at the cuffs. Raw, scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with round metal studs and a slightly higher shaft with a zip in one side. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels 5.5 cm.

Rain jacket in windproof, waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable hood with elasticated sides, a zip down the front and an elasticated hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Long jersey T-shirt with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorter jumper in a fluffy knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a gathered, elasticated neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with open lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Chelsea boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Coat in felted fabric with notch lapels, welt side pockets, a tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. No buttons. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck body with a cut-out section at the front, an opening with buttons at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted lace dress with frills on the front and a zip at the back. Long sleeves and frilled seam at the waist. Jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Blouse in patterned cotton with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with a ballerina neckline and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Wrapover pointelle bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent fabric with a detachable, lined drawstring hood that has a faux fur trim. Zip down the front and a wind flap with press-studs. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, flap patch pockets with press-studs and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse with a smocked stand-up collar and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a frill and smocking at the cuffs.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Set with an Alice band, four hair grips and a pair of earrings in metal decorated with sparkly stones. Length of hair grips approx. 5.5 cm. Diameter of earrings approx. 2.3 cm.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, and soft fleece inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Set in an airy, organic cotton weave. Wrapover dress with flutter sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist, concealed press-stud and decorative bow at one side and a flared skirt. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the legs.
